title: fail lm_fpga.elf in concat netowrk
body:
branch: https://github.com/ruimashita/blueoil/tree/simple_concat

I create simple branch and concat quantized network, the result on FPGA is fail in error order 1e-4.


Result of lm_fpga.elf on de10 nano:
```
root@DE10_NANO:~/simple_concat/cifar10/export/save.ckpt-500/32x32/output# ./models/lib/lm_fpga.elf ../cat.jpg/000_images_placeholder\:0.npy ../cat.jpg/063_output\:0.npy
-------------------------------------------------------------
Comparison: Default network test  failed...
Failed count: 2
First failed report
index: 0 / 10
input: 0.0688043, expected: 0.0687611

-------------------------------------------------------------
AveragePool,134,  sum:0.134ms
BatchNorm,497,126,  sum:0.623ms
Convolution,386,  sum:0.386ms
Packing input for kn2row,121,146,  sum:0.267ms
QConv2D kn2row tiling,2324,1015,  sum:3.339ms
QTZ_linear_mid_tread_half,790,  sum:0.79ms
QuantizedConv2D,1570,  sum:1.57ms
QuantizedConv2D_ApplyScalingFactor,232,  sum:0.232ms
SoftMax,111,  sum:0.111ms
TotalInitTime,2397,  sum:2.397ms
TotalRunTime,7300,  sum:7.3ms
func_ConcatOnDepth,224,  sum:0.224ms
kn2row-1x1,378,  sum:0.378ms
matrix_multiplication,370,  sum:0.37ms
matrix_transpose (row_major),10,  sum:0.01ms
pack_input_to_qwords,110,138,  sum:0.248ms

```


config: https://github.com/ruimashita/blueoil/blob/simple_concat/lmnet/configs/simple_concat/cifar10.py

network: https://github.com/ruimashita/blueoil/blob/simple_concat/lmnet/lmnet/networks/classification/simple_concat.py

network:
```
    def base(self, images, is_training, *args, **kwargs):
        self.images = images

        x = conv(images, 32, 1)
        x = batch_norm(x, is_training)
        x = self.activation(x)

        stock = x

        with tf.variable_scope("", custom_getter=self.custom_getter):

            x = conv(x, 32, 3)
            x = batch_norm(x, is_training)
            x = self.activation(x)

            x = tf.concat([stock, x], axis=3)

            x = conv(x, self.num_classes, 3)
            x = batch_norm(x, is_training)

            h = x.get_shape()[1].value if self.data_format == 'NHWC' else x.get_shape()[2].value
            w = x.get_shape()[2].value if self.data_format == 'NHWC' else x.get_shape()[3].value
            x = tf.layers.average_pooling2d(name='pool7',
                                            inputs=x,
                                            pool_size=[h, w],
                                            padding='VALID',
                                            strides=1)

            self.base_output = tf.reshape(x, [-1, self.num_classes], name='pool7_reshape')

        return self.base_output
```
